CBE_CommandsName.label: Name
CBE_CommandsName.tooltip: The command that lists all registered commands

CBE_CommandsIsGlobal.label: Global cooldown
CBE_CommandsIsGlobal.tooltip: Is the cooldown global or user based?

CBE_CommandsDescription.label: Description
CBE_CommandsDescription.tooltip: The full description of this command

CBE_String_CommandJoin.label: Limiter
CBE_String_CommandJoin.tooltip: The string to use for separating commands

CBE_CooldownName.label: Name
CBE_CooldownName.tooltip: The command that shows the cooldown status

CBE_CooldownIsGlobal.label: Global cooldown
CBE_CooldownIsGlobal.tooltip: Is the cooldown global or user based?

CBE_CooldownDescription.value: Shows current status of all commands
CBE_CooldownDescription.label: Description
CBE_CooldownDescription.tooltip: The full description of this command

CBE_String_CooldownFormat.label: Cooldown format (available tags: $command, $cooldown)
CBE_String_CooldownFormat.tooltip: The cooldown text format for a single command

CBE_String_CooldownNoCommandsOnCooldown.value: There are no commands on cooldown
CBE_String_CooldownNoCommandsOnCooldown.label: Text for non existing cooldown
CBE_String_CooldownNoCommandsOnCooldown.tooltip: The text that is shown when there are no commands on cooldown

CBE_String_CooldownCurrentlyOnCooldown.label: Text for global cooldown (available tags: $list)
CBE_String_CooldownCurrentlyOnCooldown.tooltip: The text that is shown for global cooldown when fetching cooldowns

CBE_String_CooldownCurrentlyOnUserCooldo.label: Text for user cooldown (available tags: $list)
CBE_String_CooldownCurrentlyOnUserCooldo.tooltip: The text that is shown for user cooldown when fetching cooldowns

CBE_String_CooldownJoin.label: Cooldown command separator
CBE_String_CooldownJoin.tooltip: The string used for separating commands on cooldown

CBE_HelpName.label: Name
CBE_HelpName.tooltip: The command that shows help for a command

CBE_HelpIsGlobal.label: Global cooldown
CBE_HelpIsGlobal.tooltip: Is the cooldown global or user based?

CBE_HelpDescription.value: Shows help for the given command
CBE_HelpDescription.label: Description
CBE_HelpDescription.tooltip: The full description of this command

CBE_String_Help.label: Help text (available tags: $usage, $cooldown, $description)
CBE_String_Help.tooltip: The text that is shown when using the help command

CBE_String_HelpUnknown.label: Unknown command response (available tags: $command)
CBE_String_HelpUnknown.tooltip: The text that is shown when requesting help for an unknown command
